script
start !style_error(Unknown construction message:) Exception: scriptTable_1_0 deviceinstallation Test not run



Narrative


In order to make installed devices available
As an OSP
I want to make sure a new device can be added

Scenario: Add new device


script
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a valid add device request
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the add device request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device should be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the owner authorization should be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the add device request should return an add device response

Scenario: Add new device with empty device identification


script
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist an add device request with empty device identification
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the add device request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device should not be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the owner authorization should not be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the add device request should return a validation exception

Scenario: Add new device with only spaces as device identification


script
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist an add device request with only spaces as device identification
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the add device request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device should not be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the owner authorization should not be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the add device request should return a validation exception


Scenario: Add new device with invalid device identification


script
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist an add device request with invalid device identification
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the add device request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device should not be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the owner authorization should not be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the add device request should return a validation exception


Scenario: Add new device with already existing device identification


script
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist an add device request with existing device identification
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the add device request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device should not be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the owner authorization should not be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the add device request should return an existing entity exception


Scenario: Add new device with empty owner organisation


script
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist an add device request with empty owner organisation
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the add device request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device should not be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the owner authorization should not be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the add device request should return a validation exception

Scenario: Add new device with unknown owner organisation


script
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist an add device request with unknown owner organisation
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the add device request is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device should not be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the owner authorization should not be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the add device request should return an unknown entity exception
